name: Skeleton Warrior
flavor: A dirt-covered skeleton armed with a rusted blade.

features.name: Only Bones - Passive
features.desc: The Warrior is resistant to physical damage.

features.name: Reform - Reaction
features.desc: When the Warrior is defeated, roll a d6. On a result of 6, if there are other adversaries on the battlefield, the Warrior re-forms with no marked HP.
